headline: DexCom (DXCM): Valuation in Focus After Q2 Revenue Beat and Cautious Outlook on Sector Tensions
summary: DexCom (DXCM) shares are in the spotlight after the company delivered better-than-expected second quarter revenues. However, a softer full-year outlook has drawn investor caution. Sector-wide trade tensions have also impacted sentiment. See our latest analysis for DexCom. DexCom’s share price has lost some momentum lately, reflecting both sector-wide pressure from US-China trade uncertainty and a cautious full-year outlook that overshadowed its quarterly revenue beat. While the 1-year total...

headline: Has DexCom’s Latest 14.5% Drop Created an Opportunity for Investors in 2025?
summary: If you’re trying to figure out whether now’s the time to buy, hold, or even sell DexCom stock, you’re not alone. After all, its share price has been a bit of a roller coaster lately. Over the last month, DexCom dropped 14.5%, extending a slide that’s seen the stock down 16.9% year-to-date and off more than 34% from its highs of the past few years. It’s not all bad news, though. Alongside shifting market dynamics around growth and risk, the most recent 1.7% weekly dip could be sparking new...
